_header: Better is the poor in his simplesse
_description: On wealth — one couplet translating ‘Melior est pauper ambulans in simplicitate sua…’ (Prov. 19:1) which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Betre is þe pore in his si[m]plesseÞan þe riche
                    þat liuet with vnrithfulnesse
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 15.
